cause.description:
Encourage the construction of Brighton & Hove Albion's Stadium, Falmer, so the fans can watch their club on a platform that the great club deserves.
1. The club needs the stadium to improve
2. The pros outweigh the cons in terms of planning permission
3. Ten years after we lost the Goldstone Ground, it's time we had a proper home
cause.name: Brighton & Hove Albion deserve a home
